subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Led by DeAndre Daniels (20 points), UConn beat Florida, the N.C.A.A. tournament’s top overall seed, for a second time this season and advanced to the championship game.
snippet: Led by DeAndre Daniels (20 points), UConn beat Florida, the N.C.A.A. tournament’s top overall seed, for a second time this season and advanced to the championship game.
